Configure Individual Column

Source: R/hot_functions.R
hot_col.Rd

Configure Individual Column

Usage

hot_col(
  hot,
  col,
  type = c("text", "numeric", "checkbox", "date", "time", "dropdown", "autocomplete",
    "password", "select", "handsontable"),
  source = NULL,
  strict = NULL,
  readOnly = NULL,
  width = NULL,
  format = NULL,
  dateFormat = NULL,
  checkedTemplate = NULL,
  uncheckedTemplate = NULL,
  visibleRows = NULL,
  allowInvalid = NULL,
  trimDropdown = NULL,
  filter = NULL,
  allowEmpty = NULL,
  copyable = NULL,
  numericFormat = NULL,
  correctFormat = NULL,
  defaultDate = NULL,
  datePickerConfig = NULL,
  className = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

hot

A handsontable widget object

col

Column name or index to configure

type

Column type: "text", "numeric", "checkbox", "date", "time", "dropdown", "autocomplete", "password", "select", "handsontable"

source

For dropdown/autocomplete type, vector of allowed values

strict

Logical, strict validation for dropdowns/autocomplete

readOnly

Logical, make column read-only

width

Column width in pixels

format

For numeric columns, number format

dateFormat

For date columns, date format

checkedTemplate

For checkbox columns, value when checked

uncheckedTemplate

For checkbox columns, value when unchecked

visibleRows

For dropdown type, number of visible rows in dropdown

allowInvalid

Logical, allow invalid values

trimDropdown

For autocomplete, trim dropdown width to fit content

filter

For autocomplete, enable filtering of dropdown options

allowEmpty

For autocomplete, allow empty values

copyable

For password type, allow copying values (default FALSE)

numericFormat

For numeric type, advanced formatting options (list)

correctFormat

For numeric type, auto-correct number format

defaultDate

For date type, default date value

datePickerConfig

For date type, date picker configuration (list)

className

CSS class name for cells

...

Additional column configuration options

Value

Modified handsontable widget

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)

  ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Individual Column Configuration"),
    handsontableOutput("table")
  )

  server <- function(input, output, session) {
    df <- data.frame(
      ID = 1:5,
      Name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie", "Diana", "Eve"),
      Score = c(85.5, 92.3, 78.1, 95.7, 88.9),
      Grade = c("B", "A", "C", "A", "B"),
      Active = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)
    )

    output$table <- renderHandsontable({
      handsontable(df) |>
        hot_col(col = 1, readOnly = TRUE, width = 60) |>
        hot_col(col = 3, type = "numeric", format = "0.0") |>
        hot_col(
          col = 4, type = "dropdown",
          source = c("A", "B", "C", "D", "F")
        ) |>
        hot_col(col = 5, type = "checkbox")
    })
  }

  shinyApp(ui, server)
}
